title: Trump Stays Out of Public View After U.S. Launches Military Assault on Iran
summary_full: President Trump did not deliver a formal address to the American public to explain why the country was at war, a departure from his predecessors.
summary_public: President Trump did not deliver a formal address to the American public to explain why the country was at war, a departure from his predecessors.

IR.label: negative
IR.evidence: U.S. Launches Military Assault on Iran
